span.style: line-height: 19.5px; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

br.span:
Computers distributed for home instruction are to be kept at home until school reopens. Parents are not to bring devices with issues back to school during the crisis.
If the problem appears to involve the charger (The charging light does not come on when you plug it in) you can purchase another charger on you own.
Broken devices can be returned once schools reopen.

span.style: font-size: 20px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; letter-spacing: 0.3px;

p.span: If a student's device does not function, they will need to secure paper copies of work to complete.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 19.5px; text-align: center;
div.span: Contact your student's school and make an appointment to obtain a packet of materials.Walk-ins requests will not be accepted.

strong.span: esidency Affidavit click picture for English
